message: Starting investigation into autonomous agent prompt engineering patterns. Will analyze failure modes, explicit vs implicit instructions, and accountability mechanisms.
Analyzing explicit vs implicit instructions, accountability mechanisms, and forcing deeper thinking patterns

Investigation complete. Documented 7 critical anti-patterns (Completion Bias, Scope Creep, Implicit Context Assumption, Agent Psychology), 3 key mechanisms (Forced Self-Interrogation, Type-Specific Prompts, Explicit vs Implicit Balance), and coordinated findings with other investigators. All patterns include practical examples and implementation guidance.
